DOC.brief_summary: Organ protection, volatile anesthetics, postconditioning, hepatic surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study aims at the evaluation of a potential attenuation of ischemic-reperfusion injury in the liver with sevoflurane postconditioning upon reperfusion.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: older than 18 years patients undergoing liver resection (benign or malignant tumors) Exclusion criteria: nongerman speakers laparoscopic liver resection coagulopathy (platelets < 50'000/ml, Quick < 50%) liver cirrhosis
